gene.name: Fighter
gene.description: Throws a Rusty Sword, which deals 200% Damage
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets on team deal 1.20x Damage

shinyBonus.shinyBonusDesc: +{% Faster Shiny Pet Lv Up Rate

gene.name: Forager
gene.description: Heals all pets by 25% HP
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, this pet contributes 2x Foraging Speed

gene.name: Boomer
gene.description: Throws a boomerang, which deals 60% Damage and has an 80% chance to bounce
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, the pet in front of this one has ability reset to 30%

gene.name: Fleeter
gene.description: Boosts ability recharge rate for all pets by +30% for 8 sec. Doesn't boost other Fleeter pets though.
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, all pets contribute 1.30x more Foraging Speed

gene.name: Fighter
gene.description: Throws a Rusty Sword, which deals 200% Damage
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets on team deal 1.20x Damage

gene.name: Cursory
gene.description: Shoots a Cursed Skull, which deals 50% Damage, and makes all future attacks deal +5% more dmg
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, pets in front and behind this one deal 1.50x Damage

gene.name: Amplifier
gene.description: Summons a spiral, which deals 100% Damage, and +50% more Damage for each attack that moves through it
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets have +10% Crit Chance

gene.name: Targeter
gene.description: The next non Basic Attack fired will deal x2.50 Damage.
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, this pet contributes 5x Foraging Speed if the pet above this one is also a Targeter

gene.name: Mercenary
gene.description: Throws 2-3 small daggers which deal 150% Damage
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, this pet contributes 2x Fight Power

gene.name: Refiller
gene.description: For 5 seconds, every non Basic Attack that hits a monster refills a random ability on the team by 5%
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all abilites start at +25% filled

gene.name: Miasma
gene.description: Fully heal all pets. Also, for 60 sec all enemies have -100% crit chance and all pets have +20% block chance. Always starts 100% filled
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, all pets on the team contribute 4.00x more Foraging Speed if there aren't two pets of the same type.

shinyBonus.shinyBonusDesc: +{% Faster Shiny Pet Lv Up Rate

gene.name: Amplifier
gene.description: Summons a spiral, which deals 100% Damage, and +50% more Damage for each attack that moves through it
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets have +10% Crit Chance

gene.name: Heavyweight
gene.description: Shoots a giant fist that deals 300% Damage. The giant fist itself shoots a basic fist attack every 1 sec.
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets shoot their basic fist attacks +10% faster

gene.name: Refiller
gene.description: For 5 seconds, every non Basic Attack that hits a monster refills a random ability on the team by 5%
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all abilites start at +25% filled

gene.name: Borger
gene.description: Shoots 2 basic attacks, but would much rather have shot 2 burgers into its mouth
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, this pet has +2000% hp. Big borger, big health. @ When foraging, this pet contributes 10x more foraging speed if the territory above has at least one Forager type (the Green Leaf type) pet.

gene.name: Tsar
gene.description: Drop da bomba...
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, the pets in the territory above and below contribute 1.50x Fight Power

gene.name: Monolithic
gene.description: Freezes time for 6 seconds. During this, pet continue to shoot Basic Attacks and regenerate abilities
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, the requirement to fill the reward bar goes up less every time it is filled

gene.name: Looter
gene.description: Activates a random ability, selected from all the abilites across all pets you've ever unlocked
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, there is a small chance to find extra spices when filling the reward bar many times before claiming

gene.name: Defender
gene.description: Throws an Armored Shield, which gives 85% block chance to pets it passes over, and deals 50% Damage
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets have +12% Block Chance

gene.name: Fleeter
gene.description: Boosts ability recharge rate for all pets by +30% for 8 sec. Doesn't boost other Fleeter pets though.
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, all pets contribute 1.30x more Foraging Speed

gene.name: Forager
gene.description: Heals all pets by 25% HP
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, this pet contributes 2x Foraging Speed

gene.name: Opticular
gene.description: Permanently boosts the Crit Chance of all pets. Only recharges when an attack Critical Hits
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, this pet contributes 3x Foraging Speed if it has the largest Number on the team

gene.name: Defstone
gene.description: Shoots multiple rocks based on the total number of blocks by your team. Rocks deal 250% Damage. Resets total number of blocks when activated
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets start 2x max HP. Multiplies with other defstone pets.

gene.name: Fighter
gene.description: Throws a Rusty Sword, which deals 200% Damage
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets on team deal 1.20x Damage

gene.name: Amplifier
gene.description: Summons a spiral, which deals 100% Damage, and +50% more Damage for each attack that moves through it
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets have +10% Crit Chance

gene.name: Fastidious
gene.description: Permanently gives all pets +1% Crit Chance, +5% Crit DMG, and +2% ability regen speed. After 20 stacks, additional stacks give less bonus.
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, all pets contribute 1.50x more Foraging Speed if there is at least 1 Combat Pet in team

gene.name: Badumdum
gene.description: Permanently boost the Basic Attack speed of all pets. Only recharges when a Basic Attack hits
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, the pets in the territory above and below contribute 1.20x Foraging Speed

gene.name: Mercenary
gene.description: Throws 2-3 small daggers which deal 150% Damage
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, this pet contributes 2x Fight Power

gene.name: Rattler
gene.description: Throws 5 bones. Bones deal 5% Damage, +1% more damage for each bone ever thrown
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, this pet's Basic Attack is now a Bone instead of a Fist

gene.name: Monolithic
gene.description: Freezes time for 6 seconds. During this, pet continue to shoot Basic Attacks and regenerate abilities
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, the requirement to fill the reward bar goes up less every time it is filled

gene.name: Lazarus
gene.description: Fires a laser, dealing 100% Damage to all enemies every 1 sec. Strangely enough, the laser will continue zapping as long as you dont click anything.
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets have their abilities fill up +10% faster

gene.name: Trasher
gene.description: The next 6 taps delete any enemy attack you tap on. This ability will not refill while you have taps remaining
gene.combatDescription: When in Fence Yard, +25 daily spice claims. Only works if pet is in Fence Yard before the start of the day.

gene.name: Monolithic
gene.description: Freezes time for 6 seconds. During this, pet continue to shoot Basic Attacks and regenerate abilities
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, the requirement to fill the reward bar goes up less every time it is filled

shinyBonus.shinyBonusDesc: +{% Faster Shiny Pet Lv Up Rate

gene.name: Eggshell
gene.description: For 10 seconds, every critical hit boosts the block chance of all pets by 1%
gene.combatDescription: When in Fence Yard, randomly lays eggs which can be picked up and will appear in your incubator. Egg laying time takes MANY hours, but will stay until you revisit the pet yard personally, you don't need to stand around personally and wait.

gene.name: Sniper
gene.description: Fires a bullet at farthest enemy. 200% Damage, +30% Crit chance, 4x Crit DMG
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, all pets have +25% Crit DMG

gene.name: Ninja
gene.description: Shoots 4 ninja stars, which deal 175% Damage each
gene.combatDescription: When in combat, adjacent pets and this one throw ninja stars instead of basic attacks

gene.combatDescription: When foraging, all pets contribute 1.50x more Foraging Speed if there are no Combat Pets in team

gene.combatDescription: When foraging, there is a 50% chance for 2 spices when filling the reward bar

gene.name: Converter
gene.description: For 15 seconds, all basic fist attacks have a 30% chance to turn into the weapon of that pet's ability, but only if their ability is a weapon.
gene.combatDescription: When foraging, there is a 50% chance to not reset trekking progress when claiming, essentially giving you FREE SPICE! Multiple converter pets won't stack. @ WARNING: Placing this pet in a territory will reset that territory's trekking progress.
